name: ProjectD
description:
Project D is a premise for a dream racing car game inspired from my favorite games and japan culture around tuning.

This project is also my first prototype with Unreal Engine.

Use the directional key on a keyboard or QZSD (I forgot to add AW to make it playable on Qwerty, sorry :( )

p/esc: pause menu (quitting and accessing some tuning parameters)

espace: handbrake

l: lights

v: change view between exterior and interior camera

Credits for assets will come later.
